# MeTH Django Rest API
To run the API on your computer, docker-compose is required (<a href='https://docs.docker.com/compose/install/'>Install docker-compose</a>)

First, run the development server at the root:

```bash
cp .env.sample .env
```

And then, run the development server at the root:

```bash
docker-compose up
```

## Check endpoints with Postman
> the send email feature is only available on the deployed app

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://god.gw.postman.com/run-collection/15550746-e3a1a55f-e566-4ca8-afb0-a6f340931bf1?action=collection%2Ffork&collection-url=entityId%3D15550746-e3a1a55f-e566-4ca8-afb0-a6f340931bf1%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3D2b32b02f-5956-4ec6-8358-e665052dce2b#?env%5BMeTH%)

Check <a href='https://github.com/fran-janela/MeTH-app'>this repo</a> for more info
